  • Constructor Details

    • GUI

      public GUI(String asset_path) throws IOException
      Default constructor for GUI object. Takes one parameter, a string path to the assets directory which contains all overlays for the canvas. The assets_path is set to the given path and the case object is set to the case.png in assets. Both construct buttons and messages is called which places the onscreen buttons and messages on the panel.
      Parameters:
      asset_path -
      Throws:
      IOException

  • Method Details

    • constructComponents

      private void constructComponents() throws IOException
      Construct buttons takes the private array of buttons and initializes it to a length of 7. Then each button is set with a new Button object that corresponds to the correct function.
      Throws:
      IOException
